org.jboss.windup.config

Enum RulePhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<RulePhase>
      • org.jboss.windup.config.RulePhase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<RulePhase>

    public enum RulePhase
extends Enum<RulePhase>
    Lists the various phases of execution of Windup. The integer controls the order of phase execution.
    Author:
    jsightler

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      COMPOSITION
      Perform high-level composition operations on the graph.
      DISCOVERY
      Called during resource discovery (finding all files in archives, etc)
      FINALIZE
      Clean up resources and close streams.
      IMPLICIT
      These rules will operate solely based the return the return value of org.jboss.windup.config.WindupRuleProvider.getExecuteAfter() and org.jboss.windup.config.WindupRuleProvider.getExecuteBefore().
      INITIAL_ANALYSIS
      Called to perform basic analysis (extract all method names from class files, extract metadata from xml files, etc)
      MIGRATION_RULES
      Migration rules will attach data to the graph associated with migration.
      POST_COMPOSITION
      After the composition step
      POST_DISCOVERY
      Called after resource discovery
      POST_FINALIZE
      Immediately after finalize
      POST_INITIAL_ANALYSIS
      After initial analysis tasks
      POST_MIGRATION_RULES
      After the migration rules
      POST_REPORT_GENERATION
      After report generation
      POST_REPORT_RENDERING
      After report rendering
      PRE_COMPOSITION
      Before the composition step
      PRE_DISCOVERY
      Called before resource discovery
      PRE_FINALIZE
      Immediately before finalize
      PRE_INITIAL_ANALYSIS
      Before initial analysis tasks
      PRE_MIGRATION_RULES
      Before the migration rules step
      PRE_REPORT_GENERATION
      Before report generation
      PRE_REPORT_RENDERING
      Before report rendering
      REPORT_GENERATION
      Reporting visitors produce report data in the graph that will later be used by report rendering
      REPORT_RENDERING
      Actually renders the report into the expected

      • PRE_DISCOVERY

      • INITIAL_ANALYSIS

        public static final RulePhase INITIAL_ANALYSIS
        Called to perform basic analysis (extract all method names from class files, extract metadata from xml files, etc)

      • POST_INITIAL_ANALYSIS

        public static final RulePhase POST_INITIAL_ANALYSIS
        After initial analysis tasks

      • PRE_COMPOSITION

        public static final RulePhase PRE_COMPOSITION
        Before the composition step

      • COMPOSITION

        public static final RulePhase COMPOSITION
        Perform high-level composition operations on the graph. Eg, these may attach metadata from XML files to related Java classes, or perform other high-level graph operations, now that all metadata has been extracted

      • POST_COMPOSITION

        public static final RulePhase POST_COMPOSITION
        After the composition step

      • PRE_MIGRATION_RULES

        public static final RulePhase PRE_MIGRATION_RULES
        Before the migration rules step

      • MIGRATION_RULES

        public static final RulePhase MIGRATION_RULES
        Migration rules will attach data to the graph associated with migration. This could include: - Hints to migrators for manual migration - Automated migration of schemas or source segments - Blacklists to indicate vendor specific APIs

      • POST_MIGRATION_RULES

        public static final RulePhase POST_MIGRATION_RULES
        After the migration rules

      • PRE_REPORT_GENERATION

        public static final RulePhase PRE_REPORT_GENERATION
        Before report generation

      • REPORT_GENERATION

        public static final RulePhase REPORT_GENERATION
        Reporting visitors produce report data in the graph that will later be used by report rendering

      • POST_REPORT_GENERATION

        public static final RulePhase POST_REPORT_GENERATION
        After report generation

      • PRE_REPORT_RENDERING

        public static final RulePhase PRE_REPORT_RENDERING
        Before report rendering

      • REPORT_RENDERING

        public static final RulePhase REPORT_RENDERING
        Actually renders the report into the expected

      • POST_REPORT_RENDERING

        public static final RulePhase POST_REPORT_RENDERING
        After report rendering

      • PRE_FINALIZE

        public static final RulePhase PRE_FINALIZE
        Immediately before finalize

      • FINALIZE

        public static final RulePhase FINALIZE
        Clean up resources and close streams.

      • POST_FINALIZE

        public static final RulePhase POST_FINALIZE
        Immediately after finalize

      • IMPLICIT

        public static final RulePhase IMPLICIT
        These rules will operate solely based the return the return value of org.jboss.windup.config.WindupRuleProvider.getExecuteAfter() and org.jboss.windup.config.WindupRuleProvider.getExecuteBefore(). Depending upon the ordering specified by those methods, this could occur during any phase of execution.
